member.name: T:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.JpegExporter
member.summary: Provides functionality to export plots to jpeg using the SkiaSharp renderer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DPI.

member.summary: Gets or sets the export height (in pixels).

member.summary: Gets or sets the export width (in pixels).

member.summary: Gets or sets the export quality (0-100).

member.summary: Exports the specified model to a file.

member.summary: Exports the specified model to a stream.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.PdfExporter
member.summary: Provides functionality to export plots to pdf using the SkiaSharp renderer.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.PdfExporter.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the export height (in points, where 1 point equals 1/72 inch).

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.PdfExporter.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the export width (in points, where 1 point equals 1/72 inch).

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.PdfExporter.UseTextShaping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text shaping should be used when rendering text.

member.summary: Exports the specified model to a file.

member.summary: Exports the specified model to a stream.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.RenderTarget
member.summary: Defines a render target for .

member.name: F:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.RenderTarget.Screen
member.summary: Indicates that the renders to a screen.
member.remarks: The render context may try to snap shapes to device pixels and will use sub-pixel text rendering.

member.name: F:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.RenderTarget.PixelGraphic
member.summary: Indicates that the renders to a pixel graphic.
member.remarks: The render context may try to snap shapes to pixels, but will not use sub-pixel text rendering.

member.name: F:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.RenderTarget.VectorGraphic
member.summary: Indicates that the renders to a vector graphic.
member.remarks: The render context will not use any rendering enhancements that are specific to pixel graphics.

member.summary: Converts a to a ;

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaExtensions.ToSKColor(OxyPlot.OxyColor)
member.summary: Converts a to a ;

member.name: T:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext
member.summary: Implements based on SkiaSharp.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.DpiScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the DPI scaling factor. A value of 1 corresponds to 96 DPI (dots per inch).

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.RenderTarget
member.summary: Gets or sets the render target.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.SkCanvas
member.summary: Gets or sets the the renders to. This must be set before any draw calls.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.UseTextShaping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text shaping should be used when rendering text.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.MiterLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the Miter limit. This is the maximum ratio between Miter length and stroke thickness. When this ration is exceeded, the join falls back to a Bevel. The default value is 10.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.RendersToPixels
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the context renders to pixels.
member.value: true if the context renders to pixels; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes managed resources.
member.param: A value indicating whether this method is called from the Dispose method.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.AddPoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SkiaSharp.SKPoint},SkiaSharp.SKPath)
member.summary: Adds the s to the as a series of connected lines.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.GetSnapOffset(System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the pixel offset that a line with the specified thickness should snap to.
member.remarks: This takes into account that lines with even stroke thickness should be snapped to the border between two pixels while lines with odd stroke thickness should be snapped to the middle of a pixel.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.Snap(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Snaps a value to a pixel with the specified offset.

member.summary: Converts a to a , taking into account DPI scaling.

member.summary: Converts a to a , taking into account DPI scaling.

member.summary: Converts to a , taking into account DPI scaling.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.ConvertBack(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a to a , applying reversed DPI scaling.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.ConvertDashArray(System.Double[],System.Single)
member.summary: Converts dash array to a array, taking into account DPI scaling.

member.summary: Converts a to a , taking into account DPI scaling and snapping the corners to pixels.

member.summary: Converts a to a , taking into account DPI scaling and snapping the value to a pixel.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.ConvertSnap(OxyPlot.ScreenPoint,System.Single)
member.summary: Converts to a , taking into account DPI scaling and snapping the point to a pixel.

member.summary: Gets the s that should actually be rendered from the list of s, taking into account DPI scaling and snapping if necessary.

member.summary: Gets the that should actually be rendered from the , taking into account DPI scaling and snapping if necessary.

member.summary: Gets the s that should actually be rendered from the list of s, taking into account DPI scaling and snapping if necessary.

member.summary: Gets the stroke thickness that should actually be used for rendering, taking into account DPI scaling and snapping if necessary.

member.summary: Gets a containing information needed to render the fill of a shape.

member.summary: Gets a containing information needed to render an image.
member.remarks: This modifies and returns the local instance.
member.param: A value indicating whether interpolation should be used.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.SkiaSharp.SkiaRenderContext.GetSnapOffset(System.Double,OxyPlot.EdgeRenderingMode)
member.summary: Gets the snapping offset for the specified stroke thickness.
member.remarks: This takes into account that lines with even stroke thickness should be snapped to the border between two pixels while lines with odd stroke thickness should be snapped to the middle of a pixel.

member.summary: Measures text using the specified and .
member.returns: The width of the text when rendered using the specified shaper and paint.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether anti-aliasing should be used taking in account the specified edge rendering mode.
